description.value:
>@Compendium[sfrpg.class-features.PU3uwrAcmGXMGo2n]{Specialization}

You can move from place to place without being noticed.

Associated Skills: @Compendium[sfrpg.skills.6by4xbwlnTJWmiOG]{Acrobatics} and @Compendium[sfrpg.skills.9rNjUXgeoDQOSpeh]{Stealth}. When you use Stealth to make a trick attack, you gain a +1 bonus to the skill check.
Specialization Exploit: @Compendium[sfrpg.class-features.WkZqCJUS19WvgeHA]{Cloaking Field (Ex)}
@Compendium[sfrpg.class-features.fQnSzzZ8GoAtaF5w]{Phase Shift Escape (Ex)}: At 11th level, you can move through solid matter by taking your body’s matter out of phase for just a moment. As a full action, you can spend 1 Resolve Point to phase through up to 5 feet of solid matter. If you attempt to phase through something that is too thick, you spend the Resolve Point and take the action but the attempt fails. You cannot phase through force effects such as force fields or the barrier created by @Compendium[sfrpg.spells.dVM22xx7CiYWY8XX]{Wall Of Force}. After using phase shift escape, you can’t use it again until after you’ve taken a full 8-hour rest.

Free Skill Ranks from Specialization's associated skills are auto applied in the modifiers tab
